list_definition.definition: a musical instrument constructed of skin etc stretched on a round frame and beaten with a stick

list_definition.definition: something shaped like a drum, especially a container

list_definition.definition: to tap continuously especially with the fingers

list_definition.definition: to make a sound like someone beating a drum

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The rain drummed on the metal roof.
